data.eml:eml: An annotated checklist of oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) of Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Akrami, Mohammad Ali (2015): An annotated checklist of oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) of Iran. Zootaxa 3963 (4): 451-501, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3963.4.1
